TableField.name: OtherAssetInventoryID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track assets inventory

TableField.name: OtherAssetID
TableField.phrase: Asset ID|An automatically assigned number used to track assets other than chemicals, vehicals, buildings or equipment

ForeignField.name: OtherAssetTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Asset Type|A method of classifying and tracking others assets of different types. Other asset types are assigned by the parent organization

CodeField.name: OtherAssetType
CodeField.phrase: Asset Type|A method of classifying and tracking assets of different types. Asset types are assigned by the parent organization

ForeignField.name: OtherAsset
ForeignField.phrase: Asset|The name of the asset to be protected

ForeignField.name: BaseUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Base Unit|The unit of measure used to normalize inventory and costs

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization responsible for the asset

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization responsible for the asset

RemoteField.name: LocationID
RemoteField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the asset is located

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the asset is located

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this asset

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this asset

TableField.name: TrackingNumber
TableField.phrase: Tracking Number|A unique number used by the organization to track specific assets

TableField.name: AssetStorageMethodID
TableField.phrase: Storage Method|The specific method used to store the asset at this specific location

CodeField.name: AssetStorageMethod
CodeField.phrase: Storage Method|The specific method used to store the asset at this specific location

TableField.name: AssetStorageDesc
TableField.phrase: Storage Description|A detailed description of the method and manner of storage for this asset
TableField.sample: The Active Agenda source code is stored on a server isolated from the Internet. The code is accesses by developers working on dedicated client PC's connected via LAN and not connected to the Internet

TableField.name: ReOrderQuantity
TableField.phrase: Reorder Quantity|The inventory quantity at which the asset should be ordered to replentish the inventory at this specific location

RemoteField.phrase: Present Quantity Person|The individual determining and recording the present quantity

ForeignField.name: PresentQuantityPerson
ForeignField.phrase: Present Quantity Person|The individual determining and recording the present quantity

TableField.name: BeginningCalculationDate
TableField.phrase: Beginning Calculation Date|The beginning date used for calculating pertinent indicators and losses between the beginning calculation date and ending calculation Date

TableField.name: EndingCalculationDate
TableField.phrase: Ending Calculation Date|The ending date used for calculating pertinent indicators and losses between the beginning calculation date and ending calculation date

TableField.name: LossQuantity
TableField.phrase: Loss Quantity|The quantity of asset which cannot be accounted for but is unavailable.

TableField.name: LossCost
TableField.phrase: Loss Cost|The financial cost of losses associated with this asset at this specific location as of the Calculation Date, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: PresentInventoryQuantity
CombinedField.phrase: Present Quantity|A combined field used to describe the present equipment inventory quantity when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: 3M 3710 Dust Mask; Respirator; Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing; 3710

CombinedField.name: OtherAssetInventory
CombinedField.phrase: Asset Inventory|A combined field used to describe this record when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Intellectual Property, Active Agenda Source Code; Active Agenda, HQ; Cold Storage Receiving Area; Server Room; Administration Building; 023; SC-AA-2003-04

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Data Collection
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about collecting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data input methods, permissions, and requirements should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about inputting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge and information that impacts the subject matter of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about organizational considerations associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about common practices associated with the subject matter of this module and opportunities for change enabled by the Active Agenda project. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Applying Knowledge
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge application methods should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about applying the knowledge collected in association with the subject matter of this module. DocumentationSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
